page.title: 07Employment in New Deer
page.content: Although agriculture is the most obvious activity in the district there are a variety of other types of work available.The main employers in the {building trade}are A.Lovie, Stirlings, and F.Simpson, backed by a number of self-employed joiners,stone-masons, slaters,plumbers and electricians and A.&D.Pirie(Electrical Engineers).IN addition Kindness{Bakers}Norries{Buses and{GRC Roads Dept.}employ a number of people. The village is home to quite a number of{people who commute}to Aberdeen ,Peterhead and Fraserburgh to work in{Education,Commerce,Catering, {Aviation, Hospitals and Oil-related {work}both on land and offshore. Finally,the village has{2 hotels, a {bar,a RBL Social Club and 5 Shops}(10 years ago there were 10) providing employment for local residents.
